name: Corona Game (CodeGaming)
description:
A downloadable  game for Windows

This is made purely in python with game library known as pygame. This is made as a fun project without any investment, but it took me much time, effort and patience to make this possible.

If you want to contact us you can join our Telegram Group:- https://t.me/joinchat/WJacV9N94byDGDrP
